thread.title: Madonna Shares New Family Photo of Her Twins Rocking Matching Pajamas!
thread.title_full: Madonna Shares New Family Photo of Her Twins Rocking Matching Pajamas!

author: Latifah Muhammad
title: Madonna Shares New Family Photo of Her Twins Rocking Matching Pajamas!
text: Madonna Shares New Family Photo of Her Twins Rocking Matching Pajamas! by Latifah Muhammad 2:22   Playing Madonna Shares New Family Photo of Her Twins Rocking Matching Pajamas! Family time! Madonna’s 4-year-old twin daughters , Estere and Stelle, donned matching pajamas in a precious new snap featuring all four of her adopted children. The 58-year-old mother of six posted the sweet family photo on Wednesday, featuring the twins and her 11-year-old adopted son and daughter, David and Mercy. "Pajama Game on…," she wrote with laughing emojis. "The revolution of [love] starts at home!" A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:17pm PST A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:19pm PST MORE: Madonna Reveals Names of Her Adopted Twin Daughters on Instagram Madonna's growing family also includes her 20-year-old daughter, Lourdes, and 16-year-old son, Rocco, from previous relationships. The twins, meanwhile, seem to be adjusting well after being adopted from the Home of Hope orphanage earlier this month. Madge confirmed the adoption with an Instagram post of herself walking hand in hand with the girls. "I can officially confirm I have completed the process of adopting twin sisters from Malawi and am overjoyed that they are now part of our family," she wrote. "I am deeply grateful to all those in Malawi who helped make this possible, and I ask the media please to respect our privacy during this transitional time. Thank you also to my friends, family and my very large team for all your support and Love! " See the precious duo sing “Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star” in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
